Info.Text: Some products may not be eligible for sale. Check failed products and try again.

NoDataProvider.Text: Database connection module unavailable.\nPlease contact your administrator.

Error.Text: Error occured while trying to start application. Please, contact system administrator.

RestartRequired.Text: Application restart is required for changes to take effect.\nClick the button below to restart the application.

Info.Text: Let's set up your store and basic application data.\nOnboarding process will take only a couple of minutes to complete.
Choose whether prices are displayed and printed before or after tax

Description.Text: Prices will be displayed and printed in receipt without tax included
Prices will be displayed and printed in receipt with tax included

Info.Text: Discounts will be applied before of after tax based on this selection. You can change discount rules in settings anytime.

LearnMore.Text: Learn more about layouts and workspace

Description.Text: Use this layout if you are using barcodes or have a physical keyboard attached to your computer.
Use this layout if you wish to visually display your products and groups on sales screen.

Info.Text: Please, enter your email adress, so we can provide more customized support for you.

Email.Text: This email will be set to default admin account and can be used to reset password. You can change this email address anytime.

Privacy.Text: Your email is kept strictly confidental. We will use your email to provide more personalized support and to send you latest updates, only if you wish.\nWe hate "spam", too.

Info.Text: Please enter your name and login credentials used for admin access.

LearnMore.Text: Learn more about users and default credentials

Info.Text: This email will be used as a recovery email for your account.\nMake sure your have entered a valid email address so you can reset your password via email.

Missing.Text: If you do not enter valid email address, you are in the risk of being blocked.\nIn case you forget your password, there will be no way to recover it without valid email address.

Confirmation.Text: Do you want to continue without email address?

Empty.Text: Pasword do not meet required criteria. Password cannot be empty.

ConfirmationError.Text: Password confirmation does not match. Please enter the same values in password and password confirmation fields.

Info.Text: Congratulations! You are set and ready to go.\nNext, open "Management" section to add some products and start selling.

Title.Text: Please enter password to close business day

EnableSelection.Text: (Click on date to change working day)

Info.Text: Are you sure you want to exit the application?
Application restart is required for changes to take effect. Do you want to restart application now?
Products are changed. Do you want to reload products now?

Error.Text: Login failed. Check your password and try again.

Failed.Text: User not found. Check your password and try again.

LearnMore.Text: Learn more about resetting your password

Info.Text: Enter email address associated with the user you wish to reset password for.\nWe'll send you a verification code to the email you enter below.

ExistingCode.Text: I have the code. Take me to the next step.

Info.Text: Check your email - we sent you an authorization code you need to enter in the box below.\nIf you didn't receive an email with authorization code, please check your spam folder or try sending an email again.

Enter new password and password confirmation for your local account.
New password and new password confirmation fields must match.

Once you are done, click "OK" button to reset your password.

InUse.Text: Specified password is already taken. Please enter different password and try again.

Expired.Text: Your authorization code has expired.\nPlease request new authorization code.

InvalidCode.Text: Invalid code. Please enter valid code and try again.

NoSuchUser.Text: User with specified email "{0}" does not exists.\nPlease enter valid email and try again.

InvalidEmailAddress.Text: Email address is not valid. Please enter valid email address and try again.

LimitReached.Text: You have reached the reset password request limit.\nYou can try again in 24 hours.

GeneralError.Text: Error occured while trying to send reset password request.\nPlease try again later.

Title.Text: Please enter password to lock sale
Please enter password to unlock sale

Info.Text: Editing a locked sale is not allowed.

Issued.Text: This sale is already locked.\nEditing a locked sale is not allowed.

Title.Text: Please enter password to access transfer option

Confirmation.Text: Transferring all orders to another user is irreversible!\n\nAre you sure you want to transfer all your orders to {0}?

Error.Text: Error occurred while transferring orders to selected user.\nPlease try again.

Current.Text: Order already belongs to selected user.

InvalidQuantity.Text: Transfer of selected item is not allowed

Info.Text: Total quantity of selected items is less than the quantity selected for transfer.\nCheck transfer quantity, voided items and try again.
Item belongs to a group. Changing quantity on group items is not allowed.

Confirmation.Text: You are transferring items to the same order. No changes will be made.\nAre you sure you want to continue?

Info.Text: Error occurred while trying to transfer items. Please try again.
Current order has fixed cart discount set. Transferring items from this order will clear cart discount.\n\nDo you want to continue?

Title.Text: Please enter password to void this order

Info.Text: Are you sure you want to void this order?

NoItems.Text: No items on order.\nRepeat round can be done only if the round exists.

NoQuantities.Text: On selected round  #{0} there are no items with quantities sufficient to repeat

Info.Text: Repeat operation is not allowed for grouped items.

NoItems.Text: There are no items in your order to create new round.\nAdd items to order and try again.

NoUnsavedItems.Text: All items in order saved. New round started.

Add.Text: Select existing or write your comment for item "{0}"

Forbidden.Text: Editing selected item is not allowed

Info.Text: Item "{0}" is ordered and confirmed.\nEditing a confirmed item is not allowed.

NoItem.Text: No items selected.\nSelect an item you wish to add a comment to and try again.

Info.Text: Cart discount is applied and calculated in total.\nIf partial refund is used, cart discount will be calculated on refunded items.

Description.Text: Enter receipt number and payment type to confirm refund

MultyplePaymentTypes.Text: Selected document contains multiple payment types. Select option below to copy payment types to this refund.

PartialRefund.Text: Using multiple payment types from original sales document is not available for partial refund.

Copy.Text: Copy payment types from original document

Info.Text: Enter quantity for next item
Item "{0}" is confirmed.\nEditing a confirmed item is not allowed.
Quantity change on bundled items is not allowed.

Invalid.Text: Invalid quantity. Enter valid quantity and try again.

Info.Text: Add products to receipt using barcode, code or search by pressing F3 button

Error.Text: Error adding item. Invalid item data.\nCheck the item price and quantity and try again.

NoItems.Text: Voiding item "{0}" is not allowed. Insufficient quantity.

Bundle.Text: Item belongs to a group. Deleting this item will remove all items in the same group.\n\nAre you sure you wish to remove all items in this group?

Footer.Text: This is not a receipt.\nPlease wait for the final receipt.

Title.Text: How would the customer like their receipt?
Enter email message details and click "Send" button to continue

Description.Text: Enter customer email address
Add Bcc recipients
Enter subject line
Enter message for customer

EmailFormat.Text: Email address is not formatted properly.\nPlease check email address and try again.

Info.Text: Please check your search parameters and try again
Search product by name or code to continue

Description.Text: Description

Info.Text: Please, add products or set sale price to existing ones to continue

Title.Text: Please enter password to void selected item

Confirmation.Text: You have selected "{0}" as payment type for current sale.\n\nDo you wish to continue using selected payment type?

Authorization.Text: Please enter password to apply discounts

GreaterThenTotal.Text: Total with discounts cannot be greater\nthen order total.

Info.Text: Invalid total is detected and discount was removed from order.\n\nPlease check your items and apply valid discount again before you proceed to payment.

NotSelected.Text: Item is not selected.\nTo apply discount to a single item, select one from the sales list before opening this dialog

GreaterThenTotal.Text: Fixed amount can not be greater\nthen item total

Info.Text: Invalid item total is detected and previously applied discount was removed.\n\nPlease check if any discounts should be applied to this item before you proceed to payment.
Choose one of the above listed options to continue

Users.Text: There are users with open orders!\nAll orders must be closed before closing the day.

Info.Text: Use the list below to select and print a copy of any previously generated Z report.
Profile

ConfirmationFailed.Text: The field for the password and confirm password do not match.\nCheck the password and try again.

InvalidPassword.Text: Password is already in use. Please use different password.

Change.Text: Change access level for selected action

AccessDenied.Text: You do not have sufficient privileges to change the access level for this operation.\n\nAccess level can be adjusted by the user with access level necessary to perform the selected operation.

Info.Text: You do not have sufficient privileges for selected operation.

Description.Text: Controls access to management section
Controls access to settings
Controls whether user is allowed to void complete order
Controls whether user is allowed to void single item in open order
Allows user to transfer complete or part of an order to another user or table (order number)
Controls access to closing day section
Allows user to refund previously made sale.\nThis will create new "Refund" document and will put quantities back to stock automatically.
Controls whether user is allowed to see all open orders.\nThis option is available with floor plans enabled.
Controls whether user is allowed to print receipt from sales history.
Controls access to starting cash section

DisallowedItems.Text: There are items which can not be directly assigned to a discount.

NotSelected.Text: No items selected.\nPlease select item on the left to apply a discount.

NotAllowed.Text: Discount is not allowed for voided items

Info.Text: Apply discount to "{0}"
Apply cart discount

TapToChange.Text: Tap here to enter paid amount

Fiscal.Text: Selected payment type contain invalid combination of fiscal and non-fiscal payment type.\n\nIt is not allowed to combine fiscal and non-fiscal payment types.

Info.Text: Choose payment types and amounts required for the current sale
Payment type "{0}" requires customer to be selected. Please select a customer to proceed.
This payment type does not allows change. Enter correct amount or select another payment type.
Select customer from the list

Error.Text: Error occured while trying to add customer.\nSystem message: {0}

NoOrders.Text: There are no open orders. Create new order using floor plan.

Error.Text: Error occurs while saving\nData are not preserved.\nSystem Message: {0}

Unavailable.Text: Table "{0}" is taken by {1}. If you continue, you will create separate order on the same table.\n\nDo you wish to continue anyway?

StartingCash.Text: Show cash in on application start

SelecBusinessDay.Text: Select business day on application start

Info.Text: Select actions to appear in button bar

ResetOrderNumber.Text: Reset order number on day close

ShowAllOccupiedTables.Text: Show all occupied tables in floor plan

Tooltip.Text: If selected, items will be displayed in sales and printed on a receipt with tax included price.
If selected, negative sale price will be allowed.

Content.Text: Click "Printer settings" button\nto set up and customize your printer

Unavailable.Text: Additional options are not available for selected printer type.\nTo see additional printer options, please select different printer type.

Info.Text: Learn more about selecting printer type and setting up receipt printer.

Reset.Text: Resets font family to default and sets font size to 100%

Info.Text: Font selected here will be used in invoice, reports and other print templates. If none is selected, default font will be used.

ProductCodeLength.Text: Number of digits for product code

TrimZeros.Text: Remove zeros from product code (trim zeros)

IsUsingPriceBarcode.Text: Scale prints price instead of quantity

Info.Text: Some weighing scales prints total price instead of quantity being measured. If this option is enabled, quantity will be based on product price and total amount from the scale.

Description.Text: If you decide to leave these fields blank, automatically generated subject and message for the customer will be used. You can change them before message is sent.

Info.Text: Go to help.aronium.com to open support request.
Location where application settings, log files and other application related items are stored.

Confirm.Text: I understand, continue with application start

CustomTemplates.Text:
We have detected that you are using custom receipt or invoice templates. Due to database structure changes in this release, these templates may not work anymore.
You will be able to use default templates, so your daily operations are not blocked.

If you still wish to use old templates, you should stop application startup now and revert to old version.

Title.Text: WARNING! CUSTOM PRINT TEMPLATES MAY NOT WORK!

Message.Text: The value of the field "{0}" is too long. The maximum allowed length is {1} character(s).

TryAgain.Text: Please enter a valid value(s) and try again.

CustomTemplate.Text: Error in custom template was detected!\nPlease contact Aronium support in order to resolve potential issues with your custom print template.

Continue.Text: Do you wish to continue printing using default template?
